thread.title: Mata inspires Man United to 2-1 victory over Wolfsburg
thread.title_full: Mata inspires Man United to 2-1 victory over Wolfsburg

title: Mata inspires Man United to 2-1 victory over Wolfsburg
text:
Mata inspires Man United to 2-1 victory over Wolfsburg to get off the mark in Champions League THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   5:02   5:03   
Organizations: 
United Kingdom (463) 

MANCHESTER, England — Juan Mata scored one goal and set up another as Manchester United came from behind to beat Wolfsburg 2-1 on Wednesday for its first win in Group B of the Champions League. 
Daniel Caligiuri took advantage of some slack defending from United to put Wolfsburg ahead after four minutes, but Mata won and converted a penalty to equalize before half time. 
The Spanish midfielder then back-heeled a pass straight into the path of Chris Smalling, who slotted the ball past Diego Benaglio to seal the three points in the 53rd minute. 
United lost its Group B opener at PSV Eindhoven earlier this month.
